com.pololanguage.sorters

Interface Processor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SingleRunProcessor

    public interface Processor
extends java.lang.Runnable
    The processor that determines how/when scanning and sorting occurs.
